name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程介紹電力電子電路的原理及應用，內容包括：(1)整流器，(2)AC-DC轉換器，(3)DC-DC轉換器，(4)電源供應器，(5)DC-AC轉換器，(6)共振式轉換器。
schedule:
1. Introduction (ch.1)
2. Power computations (ch. 2)
3. Half-wave rectifiers (ch.3)
4. Full-wave rectifiers (ch.4)
5. Full-wave rectifiers (ch.4)
6. AC Voltage controllers (ch.5)
7. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
8. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
9. Mid-term exam.
10. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
11. DC power supplies (ch.7)
12. DC power supplies (ch.7)
13. DC power supplies (ch.7)
14. Inverters (ch.8)
15. Inverters (ch.8)
16. Resonant converters (ch.9)
17. Resonant converters (ch.9)
18.Final exam.
scorePolicy:
平時成績：30％ (小考20%，作業10%)
期中成績：35％
期末成績：35％
materials:
Text: “Power Electronics”, Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華書局
Reference: “Power Electronics, Converters, Applications, and Design”, Mohan, Undeland, Robbins, 3rd Ed.
